page.title: 19EVERYDAY LIFE
page.content: Children play lots of different games in and out of school. Some children play by themselves as there are no friends that live nearby. They play with{Lego}which are plastic building bricks which are used to make models, toy cars, plastic soldiers, and dolls. Sometimes they play games with their families, these are mostly board or card games. Most children enjoy watching television. {Football, netball,}and{rounders}are three of the most popular team games. Lots of people like to go on to the downs. There is a place on the downs where there is a rope tied to a long branch, this is called the{gipsy {swing.}Nearly all the children have {bicycles,}which they can ride safely on the quiet roads.
